sn54.10:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kimilayam viharati veluvane.
sn54.10:1.3: Tatra kho bhagava ayasmantam kimilam amantesi:
sn54.10:1.4: “katham bhavito nu kho, kimila, anapanassatisamadhi katham bahulikato mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso”ti?
sn54.10:2.1: Evam vutte, ayasma kimilo tunhi ahosi.
sn54.10:2.3: tatiyampi kho bhagava ayasmantam kimilam amantesi:
sn54.10:2.4: “katham bhavito nu kho, kimila, anapanassatisamadhi katham bahulikato mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso”ti?
sn54.10:2.5: Tatiyampi kho ayasma kimilo tunhi ahosi.
sn54.10:3.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn54.10:3.3: Yam bhagava anapanassatisamadhim bhaseyya, bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
sn54.10:4.2: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
sn54.10:4.4: “katham bhavito ca, ananda, anapanassatisamadhi katham bahulikato mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso?
sn54.10:4.5: Idhananda, bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va nisidati pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
sn54.10:4.8: Evam bhavito kho, ananda, anapanassatisamadhi evam bahulikato mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso.
sn54.10:5.1: Yasmim samaye, ananda, bhikkhu digham va assasanto ‘digham assasami’ti pajanati, digham va passasanto ‘digham passasami’ti pajanati;
sn54.10:5.2: rassam va assasanto ‘rassam assasami’ti pajanati, rassam va passasanto ‘rassam passasami’ti pajanati;
sn54.10:5.4: ‘passambhayam kayasankharam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayam kayasankharam passasissami’ti sikkhati—
sn54.10:5.5: kaye kayanupassi, ananda, bhikkhu tasmim samaye viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn54.10:5.8: Tasmatihananda, kaye kayanupassi bhikkhu tasmim samaye viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn54.10:6.1: Yasmim samaye, ananda, bhikkhu ‘pitippatisamvedi assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘pitippatisamvedi passasissami’ti sikkhati;
sn54.10:6.5: vedanasu vedananupassi, ananda, bhikkhu tasmim samaye viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn54.10:6.7: Vedanannataraham, ananda, etam vadami, yadidam—assasapassasanam sadhukam manasikaram.
sn54.10:6.8: Tasmatihananda, vedanasu vedananupassi bhikkhu tasmim samaye viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn54.10:7.1: Yasmim samaye, ananda, bhikkhu ‘cittappatisamvedi assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘cittappatisamvedi passasissami’ti sikkhati;
sn54.10:7.4: ‘vimocayam cittam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘vimocayam cittam passasissami’ti sikkhati—
sn54.10:7.5: citte cittanupassi, ananda, bhikkhu tasmim samaye viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn54.10:7.7: Naham, ananda, mutthassatissa asampajanassa anapanassatisamadhibhavanam vadami.
sn54.10:7.8: Tasmatihananda, citte cittanupassi bhikkhu tasmim samaye viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn54.10:8.1: Yasmim samaye, ananda, bhikkhu ‘aniccanupassi assasissami’ti sikkhati …pe…
sn54.10:8.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi, ananda, bhikkhu tasmim samaye viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn54.10:8.6: So yam tam hoti abhijjhadomanassanam pahanam tam pannaya disva sadhukam ajjhupekkhita hoti.
sn54.10:8.7: Tasmatihananda, dhammesu dhammanupassi bhikkhu tasmim samaye viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn54.10:9.2: Puratthimaya cepi disayam agaccheyya sakatam va ratho va, upahanateva tam pamsupunjam;
sn54.10:9.5: dakkhinaya cepi disaya agaccheyya sakatam va ratho va, upahanateva tam pamsupunjam.
sn54.10:9.6: Evameva kho, ananda, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharantopi upahanateva papake akusale dhamme;
sn54.10:9.9: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharantopi upahanateva papake akusale dhamme”ti.
